caption: Relating to the registration as a lobbyist of persons who engage in certain lobbying activities on behalf of a foreign adversary and to prohibitions on the receipt of compensation related to those lobbying activities; providing a civil penalty.
last_action: 04/14/2025 S Committee report printed and distributed: Apr 14 2025  1:18PM
summary: The bill prohibits lobbyists from receiving compensation from foreign adversaries (including China) when communicating with legislative or executive branch members to influence legislation/administration. It requires registration of such lobbying activities and imposes civil penalties up to $10,000 per violation plus compensation received. This affects Chinese government officials, companies controlled by China, and their family members.
translation: 该法案禁止说客在与立法或行政部门成员沟通以影响立法/行政时接受来自外国对手（包括中国）的报酬。法案要求登记此类游说活动，并对违规行为处以每次最高10,000美元加上所收报酬金额的民事处罚。这影响到中国政府官员、受中国控制的公司及其家属。
